subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Cycling is a sport of gains through small efficiencies, particularly when it comes to the time trial, which has the distinction of being known as “the race of truth.”
snippet: Cycling is a sport of gains through small efficiencies, particularly when it comes to the time trial, which has the distinction of being known as “the race of truth.”
